item.title: Nobel Prize Winners - Authors
item.description: Nobel Prize in Literature is awarded for an author’s entire body of work, not for a specific book. item.title: Ajax by Sophocles
item.description: This is a play by Sophocles. It is in GB Volume 5. Notes Page 1: Lines 1 - 69: The play opens with a scene outside Ajax’s tent in the Greek camp near Troy.
